actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Prohibiting the use of a Members' representational allowance to obtain advertising on any Internet site other than an official site of the Member involved.

summary.text: Prohibits any portion of a Members' representational allowance from being used to obtain advertising on any Internet site other than an official site of the Member involved.

titles.title: Prohibiting the use of a Members' representational allowance to obtain advertising on any Internet site other than an official site of the Member involved.
